description: This file is a configuration script for ESLint setup in a Vue.js project using TypeScript. It imports various ESLint plugins and configurations, and defines a default export with specific project linting settings.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Defines an ESLint configuration tailored for Vue + TypeScript projects, accepting multiple configuration objects and returning a combined config object.

methods.name: vueTsConfigs.recommended
methods.description: Provides a set of recommended Vue + TypeScript ESLint configurations.
